name: As One (dizzi68)
description:
The bouncing blobs move simultaneously, but they need to get to different places! Maneuver them using walls to get them each to the right square.

I included a skip button for general use, but unfortunately there's also a bug that can create an unwinnable map. I had to submit it to the jam like this but am working to solve it.

Developed for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 with the theme "You're not alone."
